channel.title: Blinking problem

item.title: Blinking problem
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

[quote=“Sin_, post:11, topic:148152”][quote author=A.E.M. link=topic=203015.msg1793381#msg1793381 date=1191262081]

i got it out, thanks for the help.

put ABOVE boolean process not all things belong under it then try
[/quote]

You made me laugh. You just said for the method to be called above process? It will keep blinking in the wildy because it is being called every 500 ms. If you have a wildy sign in the bottom right corner. Take it out and it will stop blinking in the wilderness.[/quote]

no it doesnt need to be called every 500ms mines drictecly above boolean process

Read full topic

item.title: Blinking problem
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

[quote=“A.E.M., post:10, topic:148152”][quote author=SmokeSome link=topic=203015.msg1793378#msg1793378 date=1191261748]
i got it out, thanks for the help.
[/quote]

put ABOVE boolean process not all things belong under it then try[/quote]

You made me laugh. You just said for the method to be called above process? It will keep blinking in the wildy because it is being called every 500 ms. If you have a wildy sign in the bottom right corner. Take it out and it will stop blinking in the wilderness.

Read full topic

item.title: Blinking problem
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

ok, i’ve added a thing on my server that stays in the top right of the screen that says my servers name and info etc. and for some reason it just randomly blinks, and doesn’t stay on the screen.

i added this void -

[code]
public void WritePlayers()
{
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
String owner = “SmokeSome”;
String LU = “”;
String ver = “V2”;
sendQuest("@dbl@SmokeScape “+ver, 15894);
sendQuest(”@blu@"+players+" players currently online", 15895);
sendQuest(“Latest Update: @blu@Specials”, 15897);
sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @blu@", 15898);
sendQuest("@red@Owner: @dre@SmokeSome", 15899);
sendQuest("@red@Co Owner: @dre@Jabate", 15900);
sendQuest("", 15902);
sendQuest(“Have fun on SmokeScape!”, 15901);
sendQuest("", 15903);
sendQuest("", 15904);
sendQuest("", 15905);
sendQuest("", 15906);
sendQuest("", 15907);
sendQuest("", 15908);

setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
}[/code]

and i put this in boolean process

[code]
public boolean process() { // is being called

regularily every 500ms
WritePlayers();[/code]
any ideas what i did wrong?

edit - took site off code, sorry.

Read full topic
